job_experience.title: Freelancer.
job_experience.description: A full-stack freelancer developer uses JavaScript, React, TypeScript, SQL, Node.js, Sass, Express, Java, Django, and Python to create complete and scalable web solutions for clients independently.

job_experience.title: Compre Fácil Atacadista LTDA.
job_experience.` `: In this role, I performed administrative routine activities in the accounting department, accounting reconciliation and composition of balances.

job_experience.title: Refrigeração Araçatuba.
job_experience.description: In this role, I performed administrative routine activities in the financial department, bank reconciliation, payment of suppliers and employees, quotation of inputs and negotiation of them, inventory collection, and collections of amounts.

job_experience.title: ICEC.
job_experience.description: In this role, they perform administrative routine activities in the PCP department, data collection, plotting assistance, among others.

projects.name: Front End1
projects.description: During my professional journey, I realized my aptitude in programming. On yet another ordinary day in front of an Excel spreadsheet, I noticed that I was performing repetitive processes. I asked myself if it was possible to eliminate the tedious tasks, and voilà, I started programming.
